nvcnn.launcher.desc: Path to a script that launches NVCNN benchmarks.

nvcnn.python_path.val: $('${DLBS_ROOT}/python/nvcnn_benchmarks' if ${exp.docker} is False and ${exp.singularity} is False else '/workspace/nvcnn_benchmarks')$
nvcnn.python_path.desc: Path to a NVCNN benchmarks python folder. Depends on if bare metal/docker based benchmark is requested.

nvcnn.env.desc: Environmental variables to set for NVCNN benchmarks.

desc: Path to dataset in TFRecord format (aka Example protobufs). Files should be named 'train-*' and 'validation-*'.

nvcnn.display_every.desc: How often (in iterations) to print out running information.

nvcnn.log_dir.desc: Directory in which to write training summaries and checkpoints.

nvcnn.use_nccl.desc: This is a 'nccl' parameter for nvcnn. See nvcnn.py for more details.

val: $('' if not '${exp.data_dir}' else '--data_dir=${exp.data_dir}' if ${exp.docker} is False and ${exp.singularity} is False else '--data_dir=/workspace/data')$
nvcnn.args.desc: These are a command line arguments passed to nvcnn_benchmarks script.

nvcnn.docker_image.desc: The name of a docker image to use for NVCNN (TensorFlow) if containerized benchmark is requested.

nvcnn.docker_args.desc: In case if containerized benchmarks, this are the docker parameters.

nvcnn.singularity_image.desc: The name of a Singularity image to use for NVCNN (TensorFlow) if containerized benchmark is requested.

nvcnn.singularity_args.desc: In case if containerized benchmarks, this are the singularity parameters.

nvcnn.host_libpath.desc: Basically, it's a LD_LIBRARY_PATH for NVCNN (TensorFlow) in case of a bare metal run.
